attributes.additional_details:
Bars and Pubs should allow people over 12 into the pub or bar but only sell them non-alcoholic beverages.

This would boost sales in bars and pubs across the UK as well as boosting money for the government.

This also creates a place for young people to meet and socialise. This also keeps them off the streets and away from anti-social behaviour.

Overall I think the government should reduce the rules from 18+ to 12+
